snippet: Prime Minister Julia Gillard said on Tuesday that she expected Australia to complete its military withdrawal from Afghanistan in 2013, a year ahead of schedule.
abstract: Australian Prime Min Julia Gillard says that she expects her country to complete its military withdrawal from Afghanistan a year ahead of schedule, citing security improvements there and weariness with war.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Julia Gillard said on Tuesday that she expected Australia to complete its military withdrawal from Afghanistan in 2013, a year ahead of schedule.

headline.seo: Australia to Withdraw Troops From Afghanistan Earlier Than Planned
headline.main: Australia to Withdraw From Afghanistan Earlier Than Planned
headline.print_headline: Troops to Leave Afghanistan by End of Next Year
